name: carnivorous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to a person, animal, or other living thing that eats meat: carnivorous plants I gave up my carnivorous diet several years ago. Farmed cod and haddock are carnivorous and need to be fed other sea fish. See
carnivore
More examplesFewer examplesCats are just about the most carnivorous animals on the planet.She was horrified to discover cattle, which are not carnivorous, were being fed the ground-up remains of other animals.Carnivorous fish accumulate higher levels of toxins than their herbivore counterparts.They are carnivorous animals and it is their instinct to kill and eat.
